name: Network
body:
# Intro
The AVLien Network is a proof of concept project to show what is possible using open source software and low-cost web hosting. The goal of the project is to build a plug and play social network for local art, music, and underground culture similar to Commons in a Box (but obviously focused on art instead of higher education).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
